name: functionsGetExecution
description: Get a function execution log by its unique ID.

$ul: **dateCreated**: The execution creation date in Unix timestamp.
**status**: The status of the function execution. Possible values can be: `waiting`, `processing`, `completed`, or `failed`.
**stderr**: The script stderr output string. Logs the last 4,000 characters of the execution stderr output
**stdout**: The script stdout output string. Logs the last 4,000 characters of the execution stdout output.
**time**: The script execution time in seconds.
**trigger**: The trigger that caused the function to execute. Possible values can be: `http`, `schedule`, or `event`.
